description: Try our easy to follow Indian Spiced Beef Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Indian Spiced Beef Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 900g lean beef, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 fresh root ginger, 2.5 cm piece, peeled
2 fresh hot red chillies, deseeded and finely chopped
1 handful of fresh coriander, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put the beef, ground coriander, cumin, turmeric, garam masala, and oil in a bowl, and mix thoroughly. Heat a large frying pan over a medium heat. Add the spiced beef, and sauté for about 10 minutes until cooked through. Remove from the pan, and set aside.

In a food processor, whiz the onion, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, and chillies until minced. Add to the same frying pan as used for the beef, and cook for about 5 minutes over a medium heat. Stir in the cream, add 150ml water, and bring to the boil. Return the meat to the pan, reduce the heat slightly, and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Stir through the chopped coriander (if using), and serve immediately.
